dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.
dependencies.name: perl

dependent_to.description: Compile a log format string to perl-code
dependent_to.name: perl-apache-logformat-compiler

dependent_to.description: DateTime - A date and time object for Perl
dependent_to.name: perl-datetime

dependent_to.description: Parse and format strp and strf time patterns
dependent_to.name: perl-datetime-format-strptime

dependent_to.description: DateTime::TimeZone - Time zone object base class and factory
dependent_to.name: perl-datetime-timezone

dependent_to.description: Extensible and flexible object <-> relational mapper.
dependent_to.name: perl-dbix-class

dependent_to.description:
The libwww-perl collection is a set of Perl modules which provides a
simple and consistent application programming interface to the World-
Wide Web. The main focus of the library is to provide classes and
functions that allow you to write WWW clients.
dependent_to.name: perl-libwww-perl

dependent_to.description: Dispatches messages to one or more outputs
dependent_to.name: perl-log-dispatch

dependent_to.description: Loads one of several alternate underlying implementations for a module
dependent_to.name: perl-module-implementation

dependent_to.description: A Moose role for processing command line options
dependent_to.name: perl-moosex-getopt

dependent_to.description: Perl Superglue for Web frameworks and Web Servers (PSGI toolkit)
dependent_to.name: perl-plack

dependent_to.description: Type constraints and coercions for Perl .
dependent_to.name: perl-specio

dependent_to.description: Easily create test classes in an xUnit/JUnit style
dependent_to.name: perl-test-class

dependent_to.description: Incredibly simple helpers for testing code with exceptions
dependent_to.name: perl-test-fatal

description: Minimal try/catch with proper preservation of $@
name: perl-try-tiny

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
